paper.title: A note on the queens' problem

author.org: Fakultät für Informatik, Universität der Bundeswehr München, Werner-Heisenberg-Weg 39, D-8014 Neubiberg, Fed. Rep. Germany
Fakultät für Informatik, Universität der Bundeswehr München, Werner-Heisenberg-Weg 39, D-8014 Neubiberg, Fed. Rep. Germany

paper.abstract: A new cultivar of Ficus benjamina named u0027Francisu0027, characterized by its unique leaf variegation, which includes dark green irregular markings along and radiating from the midrib, and a fresh white-yellow-light green variegation elsewhere, with the variegated markings maturing to a light to medium green which is always lighter than the dark green markings around the midrib, which comprise 30 to 50% of the leaf surface.
